api.name: recommendClothes
api.description: Recommend clothes to the user based on their mood and gender. Use this when the user asks what to wear or needs outfit suggestions.

mood.description: The user's current mood. Ask the user how they're feeling if not provided.

gender.description: The user's gender. Ask the user for this information if not known.

meta.title: Clothes Recommendation
meta.description: Get outfit suggestions based on your mood
